refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The coref plays a role for callouts that is analagous to the role of footnoteref for footnotes.
Use one co and one or more coref elements when you want to indicate that the same callout should appear in several places.

note.para: A coref is not a cross-reference to a callout (use xref for that), rather, it is an indication that the callout appears semantically in more than one place.
